root.name: The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring
root.description: The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring is a real-time strategy game based off of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings. It is officially licensed by Tolkein Enterpriseeses and is based on the books rather than the movies. The game is very similar to Warcraft III in gameplay mechanics, with a focus on Hero units (characters from the Fellowship generally).
